title: Young Folk and the Kettle Black
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Canadian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Open, artistic and funky atmosphere. Menu changes often and is written on a little blackboard near the counter. Vegans could have lentils on greens and beet salad and other dishes that can be made vegan.
